sourceDesc.p: Produced from collation output prepared in batch file processing on 2018-10-01 10:15:03.568989 .
Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2020-01-02T22:33:56.362-05:00.

body.ab: <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0012.05">X</metamark><lb n="c56-0012__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark>In <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0012__left_margin__d2e685"/>this<del eID="c56-0012__left_margin__d2e685"/>thedescrip<lb n="c56-0012__left_margin__2"/>tion of our do<lb n="c56-0012__left_margin__3"/>mestic circle <lb n="c56-0012__left_margin__4"/> I include<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0012__main__d2e712"/>I include<del eID="c56-0012__main__d2e712"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0012__main__d2e716"/>Hen<del eID="c56-0012__main__d2e716"/> Henry <del next="#c56-0012.08" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0012__main__d2e719"/>Carignan<del eID="c56-0012__main__d2e719"/>Clerval,<lb n="c56-0012__main__26"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0012__main__d2e728" xml:id="c56-0012.08"/>in this account<del eID="c56-0012__main__d2e728"/> for <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>he was<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0012__main__d2e745"/>con<del eID="c56-0012__main__d2e745"/> constantly <lb n="c56-0012__main__27"/> with us. he went to <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0012__main__d2e751"/>sho<del eID="c56-0012__main__d2e751"/> school <lb n="c56-0012__main__28"/> with me and generally passed <lb n="c56-0012__main__29"/> the afternoon at our house for<lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__1"/> being an only child, and desti<lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__2"/>tute of companions at home, h<mdel/>is<lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__3"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0013__Pt1__main__d2e789"/>to<del eID="c56-0013__Pt1__main__d2e789"/> father was pleased that he <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__4"/> should find associates at our <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__5"/> house and we were never com<lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__6"/>pletely happy when Clerval was <lb n="c56-0013__Pt1__main__7"/> absent.
